Text:
FRIENDS -

DON'T FEED THE ANIMALS!!!! Here, or anywhere!

Yes, SILENCE, IS COMPLICITY, HOWEVER...

NEVER, NEVER, NEVER DIRECT ATTENTION TO, AT, TOWARD... THE DENIALISTS. It is what they live for. It is what they live ON, like leaches live on blood. They have no more interest in getting to the Truth than Hitler's propagandist Goebbels did.

If you ever comment BECAUSE of something they've said,
AND YOU SHOULD, YOU MUST, do it for the ONLOOKERS, those that are confused, misinformed, or uninformed.

SILENCE IS COMPLICITY!!!! Criminal!

However, DIRECTING ATTENTION (RESPECT) TO A DENIER,
IS CRIMINAL STUPIDITY. 1. Bleeds your time and energy; 2. Feeds the Animals; 3. CONFUSES THE ONLOOKERS - THEY TAKE IT AS A SHOW OF RESPECT TO THE DENIALISTS!

DON'T DO IT.

KONY 2012 is a scam.  Kony is fighting the United Nations which is an honorable cause. It's another matter if there are double funding.  Maybe the United Nation is financing Kony too, and getting him to slaughter civilians.

Anyone supporting the Un is a communist.
Communist? I thinks ye needs to be heading back to school matey! Arrrrggggh!
UN is another complete scam and a bunch of assholes and (chicofamily). you need to go back to school... check your spelling atrocities! lol

Founder of KONY was arrested for running around the streets naked, masturbating in front of people, he's a fucking nutter, UnviolentPeacemaker is a hypocritical self-righteous fear mongerer, end of line.
